blog-subtitle: Keep up with the latest from Cryptex Finance.
site-description: Decentralized platform providing cutting edge markets.

ctx-governance.title: CTX: Decentralized Protocol Governance
ctx-governance.description: CTX is an ERC-20 utility and governance token with various use cases within the Cryptex Finance ecosystem. CTX token holders can vote on upgrades and management of the Cryptex treasury, create proposals and vote on said proposals, such as continued incentives for product development and other solutions to advance the Cryptex decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).
ctx-governance.staking-description: Stake and delegate your CTX to a Crypt Keeper and join hundreds of community members who help keep Cryptex decentralized.
